articles.description: NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei and Roscosmos cosmonauts Oleg Novitskiy and Pyotr Dubrov will launch to the International Space Station from the Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan Friday. This means the floating laboratory will be home to 10 people.
